author: Erin McDowell
title: Billionaire heiress Tatiana Santo Domingo is now the wealthiest citizen of Monaco, where one-third of the country's population has assets over $1 million
description: The royal family of Monaco is largely known for its connections to American actress-turned-royal Grace Kelly. Monaco is the wealthiest country in the world per capita — one-third of the country's population has assets over $1 million. The wealthiest citizen o…
content:
Monaco is known across the globe for its wealthy residents, luxurious yacht shows, and for being the home of Europe's longest-ruling royal family. 
Although Monaco is one of the smallest countries in the world, it is also one of the richest per capita. Accor… [+888 chars]
